    • Method Detail

      • errorCheck

        public java.lang.Boolean errorCheck​(java.lang.String Customer_ID)
        This method checks for errors. Method checks for blank cells and returns error messages if they exist
        Parameters:
        Customer_ID - pulls customer ID from selected customer
        Returns:
        returns true if no errors, false and error message if there are

      • populateSelectedCustomer

        public void populateSelectedCustomer​(Customers customers)
        THis method populates the cells with customer data. Selected customer attritbutes are passed into the fields
        Parameters:
        customers - selected customer object

      • divisionFilter

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Divisions> divisionFilter()
        This method filters the list of divisions. Based on country, division list is filtered to possible options.
        Returns:
        returns filtered divisions

      • onCountrySelect

        public void onCountrySelect​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        This method calls the division filter when selected
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - clicked
